attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE URGENTLY NEED TO PULL OUT OF THE EU TO REGAIN CONTROL OF OUR BORDERS, OUR JUDICIARY AND OUR LAWS. IT WOULD ENABLE US TO TRADE WITH WHO WE WANT TO. WE  WOULD ALSO SAVE 12 BILLION A YEAR AND ALLOW US TO RIP UP THE PATHETIC HUMAN RIGHTS BILL!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
